locations.name: Club House
locations.description: The main club house facility serves as the central hub for club activities and meetings.
directions: Park at the main clubhouse parking area
The clubhouse is the main building at the entrance of the property
locations.hours: Access varies by event and meeting schedule

locations.name: Outdoor Range
locations.description: Our outdoor shooting range provides a safe and controlled environment for firearms training and practice.
directions: Follow the marked path from the clubhouse to the outdoor range
Range is located behind the main building complex
locations.hours: Daylight hours only - sunrise to sunset
restrictions: Range rules must be followed at all times
Range officer supervision required for some activities

seo.title: Club Locations - Wayland Rod & Gun Club
seo.description: Find information about the Wayland Rod & Gun Club locations including the main clubhouse and outdoor shooting range facilities.
